title: Israeli Prime Minister to Visit Bahrain for First Time Amid Regional Security Push
sub_head: Naftali Bennett is flying to Manama to meet with the kingdom’s ruler in the first official visit by an Israeli premier to the Arab country
body:
Israeli Prime Minister Naftali Bennett is flying to Bahrain on Monday to meet with the kingdom’s ruler, in the first official visit by an Israeli premier to the tiny Persian Gulf nation.
The meeting between the Israeli leader and King Hamad bin Isa Al Khalifa is expected to focus on strengthening security and economic cooperation between the two nations after they signed a historic U.S.-backed agreement in September 2020 to establish diplomatic ties for the first time.
